Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to us, encapsulating years of innovation and dedication. We believe it could potentially be a game-changer for you, offering unparalleled benefits and solutions tailored to your needs.

We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $850000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a piece that not only adds value to your life but also represents a significant investment in quality and performance. We understand that the true value of a product often lies in its utility and impact on your specific circumstances, and we are confident that this product will exceed your expectations.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this remarkable product into your world.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
